====
test
====

Global variables normalize imports across platforms.

    >>> from rpw import doc, uidoc, DB, UI
    >>> doc.Delete(SomeElementId)
    >>> uidoc.ActiveView
    >>> DB.ElementId(00000)
    >>> UI.TaskDialog
